fields.title: Welcome To
fields.description: Design the most appealing 1950s neighborhood, with fences, parks, and swimming pools.

fields.title: Settlers of Catan
fields.description: Picture yourself in the era of discoveries: after a long voyage of great deprivation, your ships have finally reached the coast of an uncharted island. Its name shall be Catan! But you are not the only discoverer. Other fearless seafarers have also landed on the shores of Catan: the race to settle the island has begun!

fields.title: Dungeons & Dragons
fields.description: The core of D&D is storytelling. You and your friends tell a story together, guiding your heroes through quests for treasure, battles with deadly foes, daring rescues, courtly intrigue, and much more.
